sentences.en: A terrifying scream in the blackness of the night made my blood run cold.
sentences.cn: 黑夜里一声可怕的尖叫让我毛骨悚然.

sentences.en: Bruce engaged low gear and drove at a terrifying speed, keeping the front wheels astride the crack as he followed its zig - zag course.
sentences.cn: 布鲁斯接通了低速挡,开车速度快得令人害怕; 他在使前轮分跨地裂的同时曲曲折折地前进.

sentences.en: I had a terrifying journey on the pillion seat of a Honda 750.
sentences.cn: 我坐在本田750摩托车后座上有一次吓人的旅程.

sentences.en: I have always found the thought of eternity terrifying.
sentences.cn: 我向来觉得永生的想法很可怕。

sentences.en: I still find it terrifying to find myself surrounded by large numbers of horses.
sentences.cn: 我仍旧觉得被一大群马包围很可怕。

sentences.en: Last night he relived his terrifying ordeal.
sentences.cn: 昨夜他又一次体验了那种可怕的折磨。

sentences.en: Rabies has been described as one of the most terrifying diseases known to man.
sentences.cn: 狂犬病被称为人类已知的最可怕的疾病之一。

sentences.en: She was possessed of a terrifying sensation that the life was being squeezed slowly out of her.
sentences.cn: 她有一种可怕的感觉，自己的生命正在慢慢凋零。

sentences.en: The most terrifying aspect of nuclear bombing is radiation.
sentences.cn: 核轰炸最可怕的方面是核辐射.

sentences.en: The mountain torrents rushed down with a terrifying force.
The new vaccine may rid the world of one of its most terrifying diseases.
sentences.cn: 这种新疫苗可能会消除世界上最可怕的一种疾病。

sentences.en: This movie is by turn ( = alternately ) terrifying and very funny.
sentences.cn: 这部电影一会儿令人毛骨悚然,一会儿滑稽可笑.
多么可怕的经历 啊 !

sentences.en: When angry or excited, however, he could be wild, profane, and terrifying.
sentences.cn: 但愤怒或激动的时候，他也会发狂、会骂人、令人生畏。

sentences.en: You might think that jumping out of a plane is easy, but when you do it for real, it's terrifying.
sentences.cn: 你可能会认为从飞机上跳下来很容易, 但是真跳时还是挺吓人的.

令人恐惧的；骇人的；极大的

trans.tran_en: If something is terrifying, it makes you very frightened

trans.tran_cn: 使恐怖，使惊吓，恐吓(terrify的现在分词)
